Prop.Name: Description
Prop.Description: Describe the content or purpose of the element

Prop.Name: Main program
Prop.Description: To specify that the object is main. That is: it can be executed as standalone application.

Prop.Name: Is User Prompt
Prop.Description: Prompt was modified by user, it will not be generated automatically if associated table changes

Value.desc: Only when variables in conditions change
Only when the object has the focus

Prop.Name: Confirmation
Prop.Description: In transactions, it indicates whether or not the user's confirmation will be requested when passing from one level to another. In procedures, it indicates whether or not the user's confirmation will be requested when the process starts executing.

Value.desc: Do not prompt on first level

Prop.Name: Assign Function Keys to Standard Events
Disabled warnings
Prop.Description: Type a space separated list of warning message codes you want to be disabled.

Prop.Name: Execute load events in application server
Prop.Description: Execute load events in application server

Prop.Name: GenerateObject
Prop.Description: Allows to enable or disable the object specification and generation.
